chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof, without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Sovle This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
X: Type
x: X
m: list X
l: list X

Goal:
incl m (x :: l) -> exists m1 m2 : list X, m ~p m1 ++ m2 /\ Forall (eq x) m1 /\ incl m2 l

Premises:
Inductive eq (A : Type) (x : A) : A -> Prop := eq_refl : x = x Arguments eq {A}%type_scope Arguments eq_refl {A}%type_scope {x}, [A] _
Inductive list (A : Type) : Type := nil : list A | cons : A -> list A -> list A Arguments list _%type_scope Arguments nil {A}%type_scope Arguments cons {A}%type_scope a l%list_scope : rename
incl : forall A : Type, list A -> list A -> Prop
Forall : forall A : Type, (A -> Prop) -> list A -> Prop
incl_app_rinv : forall l m p : list X, incl m (l ++ p) -> exists m1 m2 : list X, m ~p m1 ++ m2 /\ incl m1 l /\ incl m2 p
incl_app_app : forall (A : Type) (l1 l2 m1 m2 : list A), incl l1 m1 -> incl l2 m2 -> incl (l1 ++ l2) (m1 ++ m2)
incl_cons_inv : forall (A : Type) (a : A) (l m : list A), incl (a :: l) m -> In a m /\ incl l m
incl_cons_linv : forall (l m : list X) (x : X), incl (x :: m) l -> In x l /\ incl m l
incl_app_inv : forall (A : Type) (l1 l2 m : list A), incl (l1 ++ l2) m -> incl l1 m /\ incl l2 m
list_discrim : forall (X : Type) (P Q : X -> Prop), (forall x : X, {P x} + {Q x}) -> forall l : list X, {lP : list X & {lQ : list X | l ~p lP ++ lQ /\ Forall P lP /\ Forall Q lQ}}
In_perm : forall (X : Type) (x : X) (l : list X), In x l -> exists m : list X, x :: m ~p l
incl_cons : forall (A : Type) (a : A) (l m : list A), In a m -> incl l m -> incl (a :: l) m
incl_app : forall (A : Type) (l m n : list A), incl l n -> incl m n -> incl (l ++ m) n
incl_tran : forall (A : Type) (l m n : list A), incl l m -> incl m n -> incl l n
incl_tl : forall (A : Type) (a : A) (l m : list A), incl l m -> incl l (a :: m)
Forall_cons_inv : forall (X : Type) (P : X -> Prop) (x : X) (ll : list X), Forall P (x :: ll) < -> P x /\ Forall P ll
ListDec.uniquify : forall A : Type, ListDec.decidable_eq A -> forall l : list A, exists l' : list A, NoDup l' /\ incl l l'
incl_appl : forall (A : Type) (l m n : list A), incl l n -> incl l (n ++ m)
incl_appr : forall (A : Type) (l m n : list A), incl l n -> incl l (m ++ n)
ListDec.uniquify_map : forall A B : Type, ListDec.decidable_eq B -> forall (f : A -> B) (l : list A), exists l' : list A, NoDup (map f l') /\ incl (map f l) (map f l')
Forall_impl : forall (X : Type) (P Q : X -> Prop) (ll : list X), (forall x : X, In x ll -> P x -> Q x) -> Forall P ll -> Forall Q ll
Forall_app : forall (X : Type) (P : X -> Prop) (ll mm : list X), Forall P (ll ++ mm) < -> Forall P ll /\ Forall P mm
Permutation_app : forall (A : Type) (l m l' m' : list A), l ~p l' -> m ~p m' -> l ++ m ~p l' ++ m'
Forall_and_inv : forall (A : Type) (P Q : A -> Prop) (l : list A), Forall (fun x : A => P x /\ Q x) l -> Forall P l /\ Forall Q l
Forall2_Forall : forall (X : Type) (R : X -> X -> Prop) (ll : list X), Forall2 R ll ll < -> Forall (fun x : X => R x x) ll
Forall_and : forall (A : Type) (P Q : A -> Prop) (l : list A), Forall P l -> Forall Q l -> Forall (fun x : A => P x /\ Q x) l
map_eq_app : forall (A B : Type) (f : A -> B) (l : list A) (l1 l2 : list B), map f l = l1 ++ l2 -> exists l1' l2' : list A, l = l1' ++ l2' /\ map f l1' = l1 /\ map f l2' = l2
Permutation_map_inv : forall (A B : Type) (f : A -> B) (l1 : list B) (l2 : list A), l1 ~p map f l2 -> exists l3 : list A, l1 = map f l3 /\ l2 ~p l3
Permutation_Forall2 : forall (A B : Type) (P : A -> B -> Prop) (l1 l1' : list A) (l2 : list B), l1 ~p l1' -> Forall2 P l1 l2 -> exists l2' : list B, l2 ~p l2' /\ Forall2 P l1' l2'
map_eq_cons : forall (A B : Type) (f : A -> B) (l : list A) (l' : list B) (b : B), map f l = b :: l' -> exists (a : A) (tl : list A), l = a :: tl /\ f a = b /\ map f tl = l'
incl_Add_inv : forall (A : Type) (a : A) (l u v : list A), ~ In a l -> incl (a :: l) v -> Add a u v -> incl l u
exists_Forall : forall (A B : Type) (P : A -> B -> Prop) (l : list B), (exists k : A, Forall (P k) l) -> Forall (fun x : B => exists k : A, P k x) l
Permutation_ind : forall (A : Type) (P : list A -> list A -> Prop), P nil nil -> (forall (x : A) (l l' : list A), l ~p l' -> P l l' -> P (x :: l) (x :: l')) -> (forall (x y : A) (l : list A), P (y :: x :: l) (x :: y :: l)) -> (forall l l' l'' : list A, l ~p l' -> P l l' -> l' ~p l'' -> P l' l'' -> P l l'') -> forall l l0 : list A, l ~p l0 -> P l l0
Permutation_sind : forall (A : Type) (P : list A -> list A -> SProp), P nil nil -> (forall (x : A) (l l' : list A), l ~p l' -> P l l' -> P (x :: l) (x :: l')) -> (forall (x y : A) (l : list A), P (y :: x :: l) (x :: y :: l)) -> (forall l l' l'' : list A, l ~p l' -> P l l' -> l' ~p l'' -> P l' l'' -> P l l'') -> forall l l0 : list A, l ~p l0 -> P l l0
List.Forall_app : forall (A : Type) (P : A -> Prop) (l1 l2 : list A), Forall P (l1 ++ l2) < -> Forall P l1 /\ Forall P l2
Permutation_ind_bis : forall (A : Type) (P : list A -> list A -> Prop), P nil nil -> (forall (x : A) (l l' : list A), l ~p l' -> P l l' -> P (x :: l) (x :: l')) -> (forall (x y : A) (l l' : list A), l ~p l' -> P l l' -> P (y :: x :: l) (x :: y :: l')) -> (forall l l' l'' : list A, l ~p l' -> P l l' -> l' ~p l'' -> P l' l'' -> P l l'') -> forall l l' : list A, l ~p l' -> P l l'
Forall_cons : forall (A : Type) (P : A -> Prop) (x : A) (l : list A), P x -> Forall P l -> Forall P (x :: l)
Nat.max_lub_iff : forall n m p : nat, Nat.max n m <= p < -> n <= p /\ m <= p
Nat.max_lub_lt_iff : forall n m p : nat, Nat.max n m < p < -> n < p /\ m < p
Forall_filter : forall (X : Type) (P : X -> Prop) (f : X -> bool) (ll : list X), Forall P ll -> Forall P (filter f ll)
In_nth : forall (A : Type) (l : list A) (x d : A), In x l -> exists n : nat, n < length l /\ nth n l d = x
Permutation_ind_transp : forall (A : Type) (P : list A -> list A -> Prop), (forall l : list A, P l l) -> (forall (x y : A) (l1 l2 : list A), P (l1 ++ y :: x :: l2) (l1 ++ x :: y :: l2)) -> (forall l l' l'' : list A, l ~p l' -> P l l' -> l' ~p l'' -> P l' l'' -> P l l'') -> forall l1 l2 : list A, l1 ~p l2 -> P l1 l2
FinFun.Surjective_list_carac : forall (A B : Type) (f : A -> B), FinFun.Surjective f < -> (forall lB : list B, exists lA : list A, incl lB (map f lA))
incl_Forall : forall (A : Type) (P : A -> Prop) (l1 l2 : list A), incl l2 l1 -> Forall P l1 -> Forall P l2

```intros.
intros H.
apply incl_cons_inv in H.
destruct H as [H1 H2].
apply In_perm in H1.
destruct H1 as [m1 H1].
exists m1, x::m1.
split.
- apply Permutation_app.
  + apply Permutation_sym.
    apply H1.
  + apply Permutation_refl.
- split.
  + apply Forall_cons_inv in H2.
    apply H2.
  + apply incl_tl in H.
    apply H.```

original: intros. intros H. apply incl_cons_inv in H. destruct H as [H1 H2]. apply In_perm in H1. destruct H1 as [m1 H1].
